item.description:
Of the survey responses so far, one big request was for a sort of "social only" get-together to connect with members old and new without too much of a firm agenda. I've postponed our other potential March topics.....So let's make this happen and lay a great foundation for the rest of our 2008!

I suggest something like this:

  • 6:30 Potluck Supper / General Conversation
  • 7:15 Hear about the Survey Results - VERY interesting!
  • 7:30 Introduction Circle - loosely facilitated
  • 8:15 onward - informal discussion and sign up on big calendars to host meetups and have work parties (or even "design" parties) at your property


Potluck breakdown:
Last name starting with A-G bring whatever you want
Last name starting with H-M bring bread or beverage
Last name starting with N-S main or side dish to share
Last name starting with T-Z bring salad or veg or dessert

Don't forget to bring your own potluck kit of plate/bowl/cup/utensils/cloth napkin.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: March Permaculture Meetup: Connect, Reconnect & Plan
